mapper.select: select question.id, content, description, commentary, type, writer_id from question
select question.id, content, description, commentary, type, writer_id from question where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into question (id, content, description, commentary, type, writer_id) values (#{content}, #{description}, #{commentary}, #{type}, #{writer_id})
mapper.update: update question set content = #{content}, description = #{description}, commentary = #{commentary}, type = #{type}, writer_id = #{writer_id} where id = #{id}
